title: My washing machine refreshed my thinking on software estimation
dot: digraph G{node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor="#f4f4f9", fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=12];Start[label="Start: Move house, estimate 10 mins"];Blocker1[label="Blocker #1: Hole for power cable missing"];Solution1[label="Solution #1: Buy a hole saw, cut hole"];Blocker2[label="Blocker #2: Drill can't fit hole saw"];Solution2[label="Solution #2: Borrow a trade drill"];Blocker3[label="Blocker #3: Hoses too short"];Solution3[label="Solution #3: Try expanding hoses"];Blocker4[label="Blocker #4: Hoses don't expand"];Solution4[label="Solution #4: Buy new hoses"];Blocker5[label="Blocker #5: Tightly fastened cold water tap cap"];Solution5[label="Solution #5: Buy a bigger shifting spanner"];Blocker6[label="Blocker #6: Drainage pipe obstruction (E39 error)"];Solution6[label="Solution #6: Drill out PVC wall in spigot"];End[label="End: 4 hours later, job complete"];Start->Blocker1[label="Estimate: 10 mins"];Blocker1->Solution1[label="Research and buy hole saw"];Solution1->Blocker2[label="Drill setup"];Blocker2->Solution2[label="Borrow better drill"];Solution2->Blocker3[label="Hoses not long enough"];Blocker3->Solution3[label="Try expanding hoses"];Solution3->Blocker4[label="Hoses still short"];Blocker4->Solution4[label="Buy new hoses"];Solution4->Blocker5[label="Cold water tap issue"];Blocker5->Solution5[label="Buy bigger shifting spanner"];Solution5->Blocker6[label="Drainage problem (E39 error)"];Blocker6->Solution6[label="Drill out PVC wall"];Solution6->End[label="4 hours, job complete"];edge[color="#0072b2", fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10];node[shape=box, width=2.5, height=0.5];}
